channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Free Markets, Not Mandates, Will Fix Our Broken Healthcare System
item.description: Here’s how to bring free-market sanity to an area that needs it badly: healthcare.

item.title: Ubisoft Unveils AI Companions That Can Be Commanded With Your Voice
item.description: Ubisoft’s “Teammates” allows players to interact with non-playable characters using their voice. A press briefing in Paris revealed further details.

item.title: Do Not Click—This Porn Site Installs Malware On Your Device
item.description: If you see this message, it’s an attack.

item.title: Here’s The Exact Time ‘Stranger Things’ Season 5 Releases On Netflix This Week — Volume 1 Episode Runtimes, Season 4 Recap, Trailer And More
item.description: Here's when Stranger Things Season 5 lands on Netflix in your timezone, plus what to expect from Volume 1.

item.title: Upcoming MMO ‘Soulframe’ Expands Pre-Alpha And Opens Founders Program
item.description: Soulframe developer Digital Extremes is opening up the Founders program to allow players in on the ground floor while they continue making the game.

item.title: Complex systems

item.title: The Hotel California (and subscriptions)

item.title: Marketing lessons from the Grateful Dead
item.description: Of course, a book with a title like this gives us pause–when we think of marketers, we don’t ordinarily think about Jerry, Phil, Bobby and the rest of...

item.title: On meeting spec
item.description: The most useful definition of quality: It meets spec. The hard part isn’t putting in enormous effort to somehow beat the spec. The hard part is settin...

item.title: Infantilization
item.description: The worst sort of powerlessness happens when we’re seduced into doing it to ourselves.
